definition: to fall/to collapse/to lie horizontally/to overthrow/to fail/to go bankrupt/to change (trains or buses)/to move around/to resell at a profit
to place upside down/to invert/to pour/to throw out/to move backwards/however/actually/as a matter of fact/contrary to expectation
to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade

sentences.english: In other words, Mussina wishes the team could have that seventh inning back.
sentences.chinese: 換言之，老穆希望洋基能夠時光倒流到那個第七局。

sentences.english: This lets blood that has pooled in your legs drain downhill toward your heart.
sentences.chinese: 這招會使集中在腿部的血液倒流回心臟。

sentences.english: Any situation in which raw sewage is backing up into the home.
sentences.chinese: 下水道的水倒流回家中。

sentences.english: If time can turn the clock back, I will love you well.
sentences.chinese: 如果時光能倒流，我定會好好愛你。

sentences.english: For life goes not backward not tarries with yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 因爲生命無法倒流，也不會滯留於昨日。

sentences.english: Common symptoms of vasomotor rhinitis are often nasal congestion and postnasal drip.
sentences.chinese: 血管運動性鼻炎的常見症狀是經常鼻塞，鼻涕倒流。

sentences.english: Releasing the Sand turns back time.
sentences.chinese: 開釋時之砂能夠讓時光倒流。

sentences.english: For life goes not backward nor tarries with yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 因爲歲月無法倒流，生命也不會佇足於昨日。

sentences.english: If you want to step back in time, go to Italy.
sentences.chinese: 如果你想讓時光倒流，到義大利一遊吧。

sentences.english: This prevents urine from running back under the cast.
sentences.chinese: 這可防止管型下的尿液倒流。

sentences.english: And later, he says, water can flow back in again.
sentences.chinese: 他稍後表示，水還可以倒流回來。

sentences.english: This can help reduce acid reflux when sleeping, as gravity keeps the acid in the stomach.
sentences.chinese: 這樣利用重力的原理便可以減少胃酸倒流。

sentences.english: Let's take a journey backwards through time.
sentences.chinese: 來一次時光倒流旅行吧。

sentences.english: Today, I wish I could go back in time and visit myself back then.
sentences.chinese: 今天，我很想時光倒流，回首自己過去那段時間。

sentences.english: We asked him how the device can look back in time.
sentences.chinese: 我們向他請教這臺設備如何能夠看到時光倒流。

sentences.english: Landslide ground crack water flow back.

definition: against the stream/adverse current/a countercurrent/fig. reactionary tendency/to go against the trend
to start over/to do sth all over again
to flow at great speed/to pour/racing current
to cleanse/to scrub/to scour/to wash down/to erode/to wash away
(of time) to pass quickly/to be fleeting
to flow backwards (of water, because of flood, tide, wind etc)/reverse flow/to back up (sewage)
